item.title: The event page is now available
item.description: Go Conference is a half-annual conference of programming language Go in Tokyo. Date and Venue October 28th, 2019 Midori Community Center, Sumida-ku, Tokyo Call for Proposals If you have an idea for your talk, please submit a proposal :)
